name: Riot of Willy
description:
Willy Waiting


In a dark, forgotten forest stands an abandoned house where human experiments were conducted. The evil Dr Willy tested a substance that turned people into monsters. Now these monsters hide in this house and wait for people to come there to take their souls and feel alive again. Willie himself has also turned into a monster, he is hiding in the basement and waiting for new souls. You came to this house to find out the truth, and now your task is to escape and get out of there!

FEATURES:

Unique monsters
Original and exciting game story
Beautiful horror locations

Inventory


The walkie-talkie will help you in passing the game, this walkie-talkie you found right in front of the entrance to the abandoned house, with you in touch with a man who has undergone the experiment and is already in the stage of transformation....... Now he is hiding in the basement from Willy, you have little time to get out. Don't forget to use the radio so that the person on the other end of the wire can help you.


Stay with us, many more interesting things await you!
